mapper.insert: insert into question(question_num, usertype, questiontype, title, writer, id, content, pw, question_date, groups) values(question_seq.nextval, #{userType}, #{questionType}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{id}, #{content}, #{pw}, sysdate, question_seq.currval)
mapper.select: select count(*) from question where usertype='손님'
select * from ( select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from question where usertype='손님' order by groups DESC,step asc) A) where rn between #{start} AND #{end}
select count(*) from question where usertype = '손님' and ${param1} like '%' || #{param2} || '%' order by groups desc, step asc

select * from ( select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from question where usertype = '손님' and ${searchType} like '%' || #{searchContent} || '%' order by groups desc, step asc) A) where rn between #{start} AND #{end}
select count(*) from question where usertype='업체'
select * from ( select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from question where usertype='업체' order by groups DESC,step asc) A) where rn between #{start} AND #{end}
select count(*) from question where usertype = '업체' and ${param1} like '%' || #{param2} || '%' order by groups desc, step asc

select * from ( select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from question where usertype = '업체' and ${searchType} like '%' || #{searchContent} || '%' order by groups desc, step asc) A) where rn between #{start} AND #{end}
select * from ( select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from question order by groups DESC,step asc) A) where rn between #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.update: update question set step = step + 1 where groups = #{param1} and step > #{param2}
